unmappedTerms: I think that it is disgraceful that race or gender are used to decide whether or not to hire someone.
I want my city to have better public transportation options.
The cost of housing is too high in my area.
Environmental regulations are hurting small businesses.
We need to invest more in renewable energy sources.
Healthcare costs are too high for average Americans.
Immigration policies need to be stricter.
Gun violence is a major concern in my community.
Schools need more funding for quality education.
Tax rates for corporations should be increased.
